questions.question_text: Which describes the 'plan' value chain activity?

choices.C: It ensures that service components are available when and where they are needed, and meet agreed specifications
choices.B: It ensures that services are delivered and supported according to agreed specifications and stakeholders' expectations
choices.D: It ensures continual improvement of products, services, and practices across all value chain activities
choices.A: It ensures a shared understanding of the current status and vision for all products and services across the organization

discussion.content:
A. It ensures a shared understanding of the current status and vision for all products and services across the organization - Plan
B. It ensures that services are delivered and supported according to agreed specifications and stakeholders' expectations - Deliver and Support
C. It ensures that service components are available when and where they are needed, and meet agreed specifications - Obtain/Build
D. It ensures continual improvement of products, services, and practices across all value chain activities - Improve

Selected Answer: A
I believe A is correct
A is correct, per definition.
A is correct.

A is ok.
